participant_1.background:
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.
I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.
i freeze up in social situations.

participant_2.background:
I feel like my heart is beating in time with the rain.
i work at a bookstore.
I remember listening to the radio with my father and singing along to the songs.
I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies.
i am dumpy.

content.text: Hello! I am just finishing a long day at work. I love my job, but I am really looking forward to some down time.
Hello! I work at a bookstore. I am listening to the rain and it's making me feel calm.
Rain always makes me feel relaxed. I listen to the Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
I love the Red Hot Chili Peppers! I remember listening to them with my dad when I was a kid.
That's awesome! They are one of my favorite bands. I volunteer in my son's Boy Scout troop.
That's great! I am not good at social situations. I freeze up when I talk to people.
I know how that feels. I used to be the same way. But I have learned to relax and just be myself.
That's good to hear. I am trying to be more social.
It takes time. But it's worth it.
